resources.string:
"Designed and Developed by Mark Pereira for the Mobile Applications Development SET08114 Coursework." "This is a Prototype version. Some features designed/expected in the report may not be available in this Version.

"
"Usage: Simply select an Image from the Library. When it opens, enter a comment in the TextBox, and tap the Canvas to add it on Screen.
" "Tap 'Switch User' when working with multiple Comments to Switch Between them. Then, type 'Move Mode' or 'Delete' to delete the Selected Image." "Drawing/Font styles and sizes are not available in this version, as specified in the Report.

"
"Gallery/Image Browser is not available. You can only select images from a static Library." "Saving/Exporting images does not function, although the code has been developed. This will be further investigated."
